title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4115.11 - Withdrawal of horse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4115.11 - Withdrawal of horse

State Regulations

If in the opinion of the judges or the starter a horse is
unmanageable or liable to cause accidents or injury to any other horse or to
any driver, it may be sent to the barn, but the declaration fees on the horse
shall then be refunded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4115.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
